 return (function execute() {

 var retHtml = '<div>First, here is some information that may be helpful for you.</div>';
 var linksHtml = '';
 var term = 'relocation';
 var portal = 'lesc';

 var getUrl = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
 var urlArr = getUrl.split("/");
 var baseURL = urlArr[0] + "//" + urlArr[2] + "/" + portal;

 var kbGR = new GlideRecord('kb_knowledge');
 kbGR.addQuery('short_description','CONTAINS', term);
 kbGR.query();
 while(kbGR.next()){
 var link = baseURL+"?id=kb_article&sys_id="+kbGR.sys_id.toString();
 retHtml += "<p><a href="+link+" target='_blank'><b>"+kbGR.short_description.toString()+"</b></a></p>";
 }

 return retHtml;
})()
;

var fieldDivTemplate = '<div style="display: flex; margin-bottom: 1.2rem"> \ <dt style="flex: 0 0 30%; width: 30%; font-weight: bold !important; box-sizing: border-box;padding: 0 5px;"> \ {{field.label}} \ </dt> \ <dd style="flex: 0 0 70%; width: 70%; margin-left: 0; box-sizing: border-box;padding: 0 0 5px 15px;"> \ {{field.value}} \ </dd> \</div>';
var htmlTemplate = '<html> \ <head> \ <meta charset="UTF-8"> \ </head> \ <body> \ <div> \ <div style="font-size: 15px;font-weight: 500;display: inline-flex; flex-direction: column; margin: 5px; width: 285px; border: 1px solid rgb(230, 232, 234); border-radius: 5px; box-sizing: border-box;"> \ <div style="padding: 5px 10px; flex: 1 1 auto;box-sizing: border-box;"> \ <div style="box-sizing: border-box;margin-bottom: 1.2rem; border-bottom: 1px solid gray;"> \ <h1 style="font-size: 1.75rem; font-weight: 500; margin-left: -5px; box-sizing: border-box; "> \ {{title}} \ </h1> \ </div> \ <div style="box-sizing: border-box;"> \ <dl style="box-sizing: border-box;margin: 0 -15px;"> \ {{all_fields_display}} \ </dl> \ </div> \ </div> \ </div> \ </div> \ </body> \</html>';
var allFieldDivs = '';
function buildRecordOutputHtml(refVar, fields) {
var sysId = refVar.sys_id;
refVar = new GlideRecordSecure('sn_hr_core_case_workforce_admin');
refVar.get(sysId);
for (var i=0; i<fields.length; i++) {
 var fieldDiv = fieldDivTemplate;
 fieldDiv = fieldDiv.replace('{{field.label}}', fields[i].label);
 fieldDiv = fieldDiv.replace('{{field.value}}', refVar[fields[i].name].getDisplayValue());
 allFieldDivs += fieldDiv;
}
var htmlOutput = htmlTemplate;
htmlOutput = htmlOutput.replace('{{all_fields_display}}', allFieldDivs);
htmlOutput = htmlOutput.replace('{{title}}', refVar.getDisplayValue());
var outMsg = new sn_cs.SinglePartOutMsg();
outMsg.setHtmlPart(htmlOutput);
return outMsg;
}
var fields=[];
fields.push({name: 'hr_service', label: gs.getMessage("HR service")});fields.push({name: 'description', label: gs.getMessage("Description")});fields.push({name: 'office_location', label: gs.getMessage("Destination office")});fields.push({name: 'relocation_date', label: gs.getMessage("Anticipated relocation date")});return buildRecordOutputHtml(vaInputs.hr_case, fields);
})();"},{"name":"__silent_TerminateGoal_02baf99e070e4e049d074b6e319424fb","applicable":"(vaVars.previous_graph_node=="Display Case___ebe30ad97e35470a94c3c534009d8c32" || vaVars.previous_graph_node=="No___738994520db940dcb73de6bdc6ab68e5")","direction":"Input","required":true,"prompt_msg":"vaVars.previous_graph_node="End___02baf99e070e4e049d074b6e319424fb";vaInputs.__silent_TerminateGoal_02baf99e070e4e049d074b6e319424fb=true;null;","confirm_msg_on_default_value":{"msg":"","val_for_confirm":true},"acknowledge_msg":"vaVars.previous_graph_node="End___02baf99e070e4e049d074b6e319424fb";vaVars.__segment_trigger_80b09550eabb407ebe43757ba277c8bb_done=true;null;"}],"variables_update":[]}],"roles":["sn_hr_core.case_reader","sn_hr_core.case_writer"],"active":false,"published":true,"sys_scope":"global","title":"Relocation Assistance Request"}</definition><fields/><is_system_topic>false</is_system_topic><key_phrases>Relocation Assistance Request relocate relocation move moving</key_phrases><metaphone>RLK MF RKST ASST</metaphone><name>Relocation Assistance Request</name><published>true</published><roles>sn_hr_core.case_reader,sn_hr_core.case_writer</roles><sys_class_name>sys_cs_topic</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jacob</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-28 22:41:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>02d604a3dbea2b402fa93c61ef961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Relocation Assistance Request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_cs_topic_02d604a3dbea2b402fa93c61ef961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jacob</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-02 13:52:19</sys_updated_on><title>Relocation Assistance Request</title><vendor display_value="ServiceNow">c2f0b8f187033200246ddd4c97cb0bb9</vendor></sys_cs_topic></record_update>
